Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-r, r-base-dev, r-cran-rcpp, r-cran-rstan (>= 2.29.0), r-cran-ggplot2, r-cran-loo (>= 2.8.0), r-cran-posterior (>= 1.6.0), r-cran-matrix, r-cran-mgcv, r-cran-rstantools, r-cran-bayesplot, r-cran-bridgesampling, r-cran-glue, r-cran-rlang (>= 1.0.0), r-cran-future, r-cran-future.apply, r-cran-matrixstats, r-cran-nleqslv, r-cran-nlme, r-cran-coda, r-cran-abind, r-cran-backports
Testsuite-Triggers: r-cran-ape, r-cran-arm, r-cran-diffobj, r-cran-digest, r-cran-emmeans, r-cran-extradistr, r-cran-gtable, r-cran-knitr, r-cran-lme4, r-cran-mice, r-cran-mnormt, r-cran-processx, r-cran-projpred, r-cran-r.rsp, r-cran-rmarkdown, r-cran-rtdists, r-cran-rwiener, r-cran-shiny, r-cran-shinystan, r-cran-spdep, r-cran-splines2, r-cran-statmod, r-cran-testthat
